description.zh-CN: 聚焦于滑鼠追踪效果的互动，突出游标跟随回应和发光反馈。创造互动式介面，强谾用户与界面的实时互动和视觉反应。，创造互动式介面，强谾用户与界面的实时互动和视觉反应。专注鼠标跟踪效果强调光标跟随响应和光晕反馈。创造交互响应和参与光标反馈。
description.en-US: Focused mouse-tracking effects that highlight cursor-follow response and glow feedback Creates interactive experiences where elements respond to cursor movement with dynamic tracking and light effects with responsive cursor interaction effects Enhances interactive experiences with real-time visual feedback and cursor responsiveness Creates engaging, dynamic user interactions through motion tracking This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. interactive responsiveness and engaging cursor feedback. Excellence in design.
